articles.title: Blood test to detect 50 types of cancer could be given to 1m people on NHS - The Guardian
articles.description: Chief executive Amanda Pritchard says that if early results are successful it will be rolled out more widely next year
articles.content:

articles.title: The lesser-known risk factors for heart disease - The Conversation Indonesia
articles.description: Gout, psoriasis, inflammatory bowel disease and rheumatoid arthritis are all risk factors for heart disease. They all have one thing in common: inflammation.
